name: Castlevania-like Demo
description:
Hello, this is a demo game with 4 stages including a boss to see if you want to get the Castlevania-like Engine on gamemaker marketplace. 

You can buy the Engine here at Gamemaker Marketplace. https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/8372/castlevania-like-engine

You can either download the zip file or the executable, which installs the game to your PC. 

If you download the zip file, be sure to unzip it, then open the Castlevania-like Engine file to play the demo game.
